active.description: Indicator of whether the product is active. Line items cannot be created from inactive products.

max_discount.description: Maximum discount that can be applied to the product in percents.

max_markup.description: Maximum markup that can be applied to the product in percents.

cost.description: Cost of the product. Visible only to account administrators.

cost_currency.description: Currency of the product cost, specified in 3-character currency code (ISO4217) format. Visible only to account administrators.

prices.description: Array specifying products prices in different currencies.

ammount.description: Price of the product in the specified currency.

currency.description: Currency of the price, specified in 3-character currency code (ISO4217) format.

created_at.description: Date and time that the product was created in UTC (ISO8601 format).

updated_at.description: Date and time of the last update on the product in UTC (ISO8601 format).
